column4: Anybody point me to instructions on running Vuze 4.3 in karmic?
is there a *real* reason you want to use Vuze, since it isnt the most p2p pirate friendly tool if your in MPAA country
what client do you use?
torrentflux.. but that might be a bit over the top
never tried it
tried transmission once.  V. slow.
slowness depends on peers, port forwarding and your TCP/IP setup
well it was an old transmission, but didn't compete side by side with azureus
but now azureus doesn't handle the tpb magnet links
side by side, you mean two at once?
well...alternating, but on the same box
as a test to see which was faster
hmmz.. well I have good experience with flux and if you have a box you're going to like the web GUI
most of the linux guys at your place use transmission / ktorrent on their pc and flux on the box
my place?
meant our :P
I just have my laptop, see.  So I'd run  a server on it?
no, stick to transmission, ktorrent, etc. unless you plan to do some webeditting :). but you were talking about a box see :)
someday I'll have one.
transmission seems to choke completely on the magnet link!
hmmz, tahts weird
seems like transmission doesn't support magnet
